meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by diplopia.
meanings.sent1: The diplopic patient saw two images instead of one.
meanings.sent2: She felt confused when her vision became diplopic after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The diplopic glasses made everything look like a blurry magic show.
meanings.sent4: His diplopic view of the world was like seeing through a foggy window.
meanings.sent5: The diplopic effect of the lenses was like looking through a funhouse mirror.

meanings.sent1: The diplopic child struggled to focus on a single object.
meanings.sent2: After the injury, he became diplopic and had difficulty reading.
meanings.sent3: The diplopic view of the street made the cars seem to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her diplopic sight was like watching a 3D movie without glasses.
meanings.sent5: The diplopic sensation was as if the world had duplicated itself.
